div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1533 Syria northern, 1960 Burial: c. 210 S.C. (Westermark) Contents: 18 AR Alexander III: 5 late post. tetradr. (Perga- mum 1, Mytilene 1, Chios 1, unc. 2) Antigonus Gonatas: 1 tetradr. Antigonus Doson: 1 tetradr. Lysimachus: 2 lifetime tetradr. (Cius 1, unc. 1); 1 post. tetradr. (Byzantium) Antiochus II: 2 tetradr. (Apameia 1 as WSM 1138,; Seleuceia ad Tigrim. 1 as ESM 181) Seleucus II: 3 tetradr. Antiocheia 2 as WSM 988, 996; Apameia 1 as WSM 1146) Seleucus III: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim as ESM 217) Antiochus III: 2 tetradr. (Antiocheia 1 as WSM 1053; Tarsus 1 as WSM 1251) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press) Sane hd. as no. 1535 below ?
